FAQ.question: Why is the BBMP Tax Receipt important?
FAQ.answer: It confirms property tax payment and ensures no pending dues before resale or khata transfer.

FAQ.question: Do buyers check tax receipts before purchase?
FAQ.answer: Yes. It is a mandatory part of due-diligence.

FAQ.question: Can previous year tax receipts be downloaded?
FAQ.answer: Yes. Past receipts can be downloaded if available in BBMP records.
